name: Cool Driver - Winter Edition
description:
Welcome to Cool Driver - Winter Edition

The object of the game is simple but addictive, simply find your present before your time runs out.

Turn your iPhone or iPad to steer the tractor, smash through snowmen & penguins, great fun for all ages.

Lots of amazing fun levels

Developed by:
http:///www.appstyle.co.uk

Follow us on twitter for update and more great apps:
